title: The Latest ‘Wicked’ Brand Collabs Flying in Ahead of November’s ‘Wicked: For Good’ Release
summary: A running list of the latest and greatest movie-inspired clothing, beauty products, homeware, games and collectibles. Plus, a comprehensive list of collaborations from 'Wicked: Part 1.'

title: Hollywood’s Favorite Flared-Leg Denim, From Y2K-Coded Low-Rise to Western-Inspired Bootcut
summary: Margot Robbie, Sadie Sink, Olivia Wilde, Tracee Ellis Roth and Gwyneth Paltrow are all on board, donning casually cool kick out styles.

title: The Pioneer Woman’s Viral Pumpkin Dutch Oven Gets a Limited Rerelease
summary: The annual Harvest Collection marks the third product launch since Ree Drummond gave her wildly successful Walmart line a whole new look.

title: Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban Split After Nearly 20 Years of Marriage
summary: The actress and country singer, who share two daughters, tied the knot in 2006.
